price: On that Day[50] We will let some of them surge like waves over others, and the Trumpet will be blown, then We will gather them all together.
arabic: ۞ وَتَرَكۡنَا بَعۡضَهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَمُوجُ فِي بَعۡضٖۖ وَنُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِ فَجَمَعۡنَٰهُمۡ جَمۡعٗا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
